title: The Southerner (1945 Drama) Directed by Jean Renoir | OSCARS® 3X nominee

sources.title: The Southerner (1945 Drama) Directed by Jean Renoir | OSCARS® 3X nominee
sources.description:
Farmer Sam Tucker and his family, including his wife Nona, struggle to build a new life by farming a harsh plot of abandoned land owned by his employer. Facing natural disasters and a hostile neighbor, they defy the odds through grit and unity, proving even the harshest earth can’t bury their hope for a better future.

Original title: The Southerner (1945) Alternative title: Hold Autumn in Your Heart

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/J-dB9rwZdHM


Director: Jean Renoir
Writers: George Sessions Perry, Hugo Butler, Jean Renoir
Actors: Zachary Scott, Betty Field,J. Carrol Naish
Genres: Literary, Drama
Budget: $750,000
